text: Saint Sophia Cathedral, or the Cathedral of the Holy Wisdom of God, is a former Orthodox church in Harbin, Heilongjiang, China. This church was built in 1907. It was closed during the Cultural Revolution. In 1997, it was turned into a museum. Category:Museums in China Category:Buildings and structures in China Category:Cathedrals Category:Harbin Category:1907 establishments in Asia Category:1900s establishments in China
title: Saint Sophia Cathedral in Harbin
